website_summaries.verdict: The best value for your money. Popular, powerful, and quiet with a lifetime guarantee.
pros: Extremely durable stainless steel impellers won't rust and are designed to reduce jamming to a minimum
cons: Doesn't fit certain cast iron sink types

customer_reviews.title: Leaks at motor seal from day one. Leaks bad when turned on but only slightly when off and normal draining water.
customer_reviews.text: it has leaked since day 1 and I have resealed everything 3 times until I figured out that it is leaking out the bottom of the motor seal and around internal wiring when it is turned on. It has a tiny drip when motor is not used during normal draining water, but leaks bad when turned on. Applying for warranty repair or replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I spent weeks researching garbage disposals, reading reviews
customer_reviews.text: My ex got this in the divorce, along with the house it was attached to and all of the furniture and our bank accounts. Me? I got to leave quietly with no spousal support. I spent weeks researching garbage disposals, reading reviews, etc... and I finally settled on this one. I installed it myself, even though I'm not very handy. It works perfectly and wasn't too hard to install. I was very happy with it. And she got it. Ungrateful wench probably doesn't even consider the thought I put into the little things like this. But this disposal works great. Wish I could have taken it with me. Take care, Waste King. I'm going to miss you : (
customer_reviews.author: Greg Robinson

customer_reviews.title: therefore I recommend another model or brand that used the standard mounting ...
customer_reviews.text: Disposal works well and fairly quiet for a smaller HP model. The only issue I had was during the installation one of the tiny square plastic retainers which fit into the ring was slightly damaged. This is the "quick mount" model. The disposer is dependent on these to stay in place, therefore I recommend another model or brand that used the standard mounting hardware which is much more robust.
customer_reviews.author: bassdan

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so loud, it sounds broken. I had it professionally installed...and the plumber even commented on the quality. Initially it leaked from the bottom, but we tightened it up. Interested to see how long it lasts.***Update: the item continued to leak and I had to have it removed today. Upon removal, we discovered a particular piece, a metal ring, was too large for the pipe, causing the leakage. A $70 disposal literally turned into $400 with the install and removal. I am beyond irritated right now, and I should have believed the reviews that mention this is of poor quality... And now it's too late to return it. Ugh!
customer_reviews.author: GODOJ13

customer_reviews.title: Jammed and warranty does not cover jamming
customer_reviews.text: So, the garbage disposal jammed. Bewarned: Unlike many other brands and models, there is no way to use an Allen wrench to loosen this one up. There is no hex hole in the bottom for that. When I called customer service and asked them about the 5 year warranty, they said Jamming is not covered in the warranty. Since that is the most common failure more for a garbage disposal, that makes this a worthless product to purchase. Please avoid like the plague.
customer_reviews.author: Sriram Gopalan

customer_reviews.title: Beware: Mounting design won't work for all sinks. I'm returning it as defective.
customer_reviews.text: The plumber I hired to install this advised me that this is a good unit, but the way it attaches to the sink is really not good. There are no metal clamps like with a Badger or other well-known brands. This just has plastic threads that are HAND-TIGHTENED and it requires a TON of plumber's putty to create a decent seal because my sink is not perfectly flat around the disposal opening. This seems like a bad design. The plumber tried twice to install it with more and more putty, but could not stop the leaks. Returning it.
customer_reviews.author: H. Reid

customer_reviews.title: Rubber splash guard restricts water flow, every piece of food has to be manually push through!
customer_reviews.text: Could’ve been a good disposal unit. I was pleasantly surprised at how relatively quiet it is compared to the old one we had. My issue with it is the ABSOLUTELY TERRIBLE rubber splash guard that comes with this. It restricts the flow of just water alone so forget about rinsing food down into the disposal without having to manually push everything through, even blueberries! I’m hoping I can replace that part with another brand. At this point, I wish I would gone with insinkerator.
customer_reviews.author: Sandia Sunset

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Installation because
customer_reviews.text: Most disposals have a locking ring underneath the sink up to and SNUG against bottom of sink. This disposal has about a 2inch space down from the bottom of the sink to the locking ring location. The disposal installation was easy, HOWEVER, that 2 inch drop down space for the locking ring THREW OFF all the PVC Piping underneath. $150 for plumber to completely REDO the PVC pipe so it would line up because of that 2 inch difference. I DO NOT recommend this disposal because they SHOULD have left the mounting the same as ALL OTHER disposals. Cute but costly! There, I feel better :(
customer_reviews.author: Tom Carter

customer_reviews.title: water runs straight through it.
customer_reviews.text: I replaced an in-sink-erator that had been in my house since at least 2000. The old thing did not want to come out. I followed the instructions and this thing hooked up really well. I tested the seal with the ez mount system and I was really impressed. I hooked up the plumbing and ran water. Straight through the disposal and out the bottom. Check out the video. 5 year warranty isn't much good if it's already failing in the first use. I'm sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: MarkM

customer_reviews.title: Useless Warranty
customer_reviews.text: The warranty on this unit is completely useless. When the gasket on my unit separated from the rubber behind it, I called Waste King. They would not send someone out to fix the unit. The offered to send me a spare part, but asked me to give them the serial number which would have required me to read the number upside down on the floor with a mirror even though I had a valid Amazon receipt. And I would have had to hire a plumber to install the spare part. The entire process was ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Tigre

customer_reviews.title: Installation manual very poor. Waste King customer service awful
customer_reviews.text: We installed the product and forgot to punch out the dishwasher drain plug on the side of the disposal. In reading the manual, we found that the manufacturer says that the plug and be knocked out into the disposal grind area, and that it will be ground up with no issue. That is not true. In less than a week, the disposal locked up. Waste King said that they would not service a locked up disposal under warranty. Thank god for Amazon!. They took the product return and we reinstalled the new unit.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel T. Mehall

customer_reviews.title: Waste King is a WASTE of $$- Defective product and customer service cannot be reached
customer_reviews.text: Still trying to get in touch with Waste King. After having this product professionally installed, electric run and plumbing I noticed the actual disposal unit is leaking from the bottom. I spoke with the distributor for Waste King who could not even give me a phone number for customer service! Lucky he even called me back. So after hours of professional labor to install this unit. I know have a kitchen sink and dishwasher that I cannot operate, plus all the costs involved. Terrible purchase! Waste King please Help, before your name is aligned with this purchase and future orders!
customer_reviews.author: vincent j giovinazzo

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy i got a used one instead of new.
customer_reviews.text: Not only the box was previously open, didn't come with any paperwork the pump was dirty and wrapped in a trash bag. Although the motor is operational considering it is NOT new, it shouldnot be sold as new. And by the way it also has food remnants or dirt inside of it. my hands are black just by pulling it out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Marco B.

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE: Disposal too long, Drain outlet too low for use with a sink 8" depth or more...
customer_reviews.text: The problem with long disposal units like this is sink depth. It's hard to find a sink with less than 8" depth these days. You end up with a P-trap too low for the stub-out from the wall. Water will then back flow into the unit and leaks will undoubtedly arise. If these disposal manufacturers were smart, they'd make a short unit with a high drain outlet (even a power assisted high drain - these appliance have electric motors anyway, just make it a pump too). They are just too long for the limited space beneath the sink. Poor engineering.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Very noisy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit as a replacement for a old Badger that I had from Home Depot. The Waste King is definitely smaller, lighter and takes up less space under the sink than the Badger, but it is also much more noisy. I saw that on some of the reviews, but didn't think it could be that much more than the Badger. I was wrong. The noise level is substantially more. It seems to grind up food particles just fine, and I haven't been able to clog it, although I haven't really tried, but the sound has been a big disappointment for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Eng

customer_reviews.title: Plastic everywhere!! Gaskets??
customer_reviews.text: The mount is plastic which means it depends noise but flexes real bad. The actual diameter is significantly smaller than the hole in the sink which means the "gasket" ( "" because it's a paper thin rubber) won't seal correctly, very little contact area. So the paper gasket underneath disintegrated I had to take it off 3 times and the thread get stuck. Ended up using pumberputty which worked. You can tell they cut costs by making EVERYTHING OUT OF PLASTIC. It's very light so there can't be much to the motor. I don't expect this to last. We bought a Moen 1/2 hp 5 years ago for 100$ way better built. This is no good!!
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Good while it lasted.....3 years
customer_reviews.text: Installed this 3 years ago, worked great, was easy to install. Wouldn't say it was quiet by any means but it was functional. It had a 2 year warranty, lasted 3 years and started to sputter two days ago and now it's completely dead. I would say I average lighter than normal use - by no means have put this through the ringer. Of note, I discovered it is leaking a little (power cord is wet to the touch). I'd rather have it die this way than surprisingly pour water out all over. Win some, lose some? Still, would expect these to last more than 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Returned This Item for a Insinkerator
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure it's really fair to give this product an actual star rating as I returned it to Amazon without even taking it out of the box. The plumber I hired only installs certain garbage disposals and this brand was not on his list. The brands on his list were, according to him, those of the best quality and that lasted longer than other brands. I suppose this says something for this brand as I definitely take stock in his opinion. So I settled for a 3 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra F

customer_reviews.title: A good value
customer_reviews.text: I have now installed two of these garbage disposals and have experience installing a few other brands. in looking over long term reviews from other people when we bought the first one, we found that people were happy with the quality and especially the value of this unit. I have found that to be the same. The units install easily, grind as expected, and our priced more competitively than other units that I have looked at. it's probably slightly louder than the other two that I installed, but one of those was nearly double the price and it's a garbage disposal after all, so it's used in very brief spurts.
customer_reviews.author: S. Terry

customer_reviews.title: Super easy install
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to install. So much quieter than the badger it replaced. First ever garbage disposal I installed and it took less than an hour with removal of the 1st one and installing this one. Also remember to knock out the plug inside for the drain line or it backs up in your dishwasher. Install video didn't say that and if you don't know you find out the hard way lol. Loss of star for the liner in the sink... it's smaller than most spaces in stainless steel sinks and it doesn't come in brushed nickel to match. It looks like an aftermarket piece in the sink instead of being flush and the right color.
customer_reviews.author: Jax

customer_reviews.title: Too much Noise!
customer_reviews.text: Every plumber I spoke to said this was a very noisy garbage disposal. I have owned many garbage disposals for years and I just don't think the reviews were given by those who never had a garbage disposal before? Well, kudos to Waste King for that. I am disappointed but am keeping it...... Just want to let everyone know that garbage disposals are usually loud, just, perhaps not as loud as this one. My hubby said the price was too low to buy this. Guess he was right? I love Amazon and have used them for 15 yrs. and have never been disappointed ever before.
customer_reviews.author: Teri  DeBellis

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: For the price point this thing rocks. It is made in China but has a 5 year at home warranty and a lifetime corrosion warranty which says a lot about the potential durability. The one I replaced was an insinkerator that started leaking from the bottom after about 7 years. Install was easy and the instructions are pretty detailed. Not too loud. The cord is a nice feature. A lot of reviewers said they took the unit apart to direct wire it, but I just went to Lowe’s and bought a $6 female plug and made the corded connection work that way. Easier than taking the thing apart and possibly voiding the warranty.
customer_reviews.author: John G.

customer_reviews.title: Some good, some not so good but overall it's ok
customer_reviews.text: Surprise, made in China! The good, it does work ok and the rough-in was exactly the same as my older Insinkerator. I didn't have to cut or adapt anything else. Bad, its noisier than my old Insinkerator and has less HP than the old one. It sort of winds up like a turbine but it does the job and you don't use it for more than 10 seconds usually. It's supposed to have a non-metallic chamber so it shouldn't corrode like my other one did. Has a nice chrome flange and I like the removable rubber guard. They usually get deteriorated over time and this one is easy to pop out and clean or replace.
customer_reviews.author: jbbrick

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Did have some problems mounting but once I figured it out it was very easy. The diagrams are good that come with it but they do not explain that the cushion mount (round rubber gasket) needs to set lower than the base of the sink flange. It looks correct pushed all the way up and flush with the base of the sink flange but will not work. It needs to hang down lower than the sink flange (so the mount ring will hang below the cushion). Lots of power for a 1/2 HP we replaced an older 3/4 HP that was much slower and louder.
customer_reviews.author: RWP

customer_reviews.title: I would highly recommend it. The quality is high and the price ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to replace our Emerson Evergrind 101 which expired soon after it's one year guarantee expired. After our last experience, West Kings five-year guarantee was quite appealing to me. I self installed. I found the directions were clear and complete. I've installed several disposals over the years and found this one was the easiest. This was installed in a cast-iron sink, so noise is not typically a problem with disposals, but this unit is particularly quiet. No vibration, hardly any noise. I didn't rate this five stars simply because I don't have an opportunity to rate longevity. Based on my brief experience with it, I would highly recommend it. The quality is high and the price is right.
customer_reviews.author: Jim S

customer_reviews.title: First time owning a garbage disposal. I studied and compared and read numerous ...
customer_reviews.text: First time owning a garbage disposal. I studied and compared and read numerous reviews. Finally settled on the Waste King for it's solid reviews. When i went to purchase, it was actually 10 bucks cheaper than when i placed it in my cart. I installed the unit under a brand new sink. The install took just a few minutes with the ez mount system and for an average DIY'er, it was straight forward. The unit is surprisingly quiet. I was expecting (and hoping) it would at least be loud enough that my 3 yr old would have no interest in turning it on. Instead, she won't be afraid of this thing:) As always, it arrived quickly and in good shape.
customer_reviews.author: aaron Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Quiet Disposal!
customer_reviews.text: Was not familiar with installing this brand of disposal. I was replacing one in our previously owned mobile home. It was one of the easiest disposal installations I have ever done. I was worried at first with the mounting system (not a familiar one) but I read the instructions and looked up a video "How to" like I like to do these days, and it went smooth. The easiest disposal install I had ever done. Quiet. I mentioned that in the headline. It is one quiet disposal. My wife absolutely loves that feature. It seems quite powerful enough for all of our needs. Quite pleased with this product for the price and the quality and the quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry S.

customer_reviews.title: I bought this garbage disposal and had it installed two years ago
customer_reviews.text: I bought this garbage disposal and had it installed two years ago, in June 2015. I discovered tonight that it is leaking from the bottom of the unit, and appears to have been doing so for a while judging by the size of the puddle under my sink. Obviously the lifespan of any appliance largely dependent on the use and maintenance. I don't consider myself to be a heavy user. I don't cook all that often, and am generally careful about what I put into the disposal. As such, I expect the disposal to last more than two years.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Jammed Unit Problem
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend Waste King disposer Model L-2600. Waste disposer failed in 8 months. Followed all instructions to un-jam but couldn't relieve the jammed unit. My previous disposal had a place to manually turn the grinder with and allen wrench, this unit only has a reset button and instructions to un-jam using a broom handle. Amazon honored the warranty and I am pleased with their service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best disposer I know of
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to replace the identical one five years beyond warrantee that had been intentionally jammed by tenants who filled it with broken glass, nails, fibrous synthetic cloth, and human feces. As it turned out, I was able to remove all that after taking it out, and it still runs just fine. so I'm saving the new one for when the old breaks, if ever. Have the same one in my own home. It's also well beyond warrantee and runs fine. They are remarkably good, long lasting disposers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rubber Mounting Ring
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Much quieter than my old InSinkErator. 1/2 HP instead of my old one 1/3. Comes with the plug. I tried to order one like my old one and could not get one for less than $115 with cord. Most were over $120 with same specs. Great price. The rubber mount was a little tricky to understand how the mount worked with the rubber gasket. But after about 20 minutes I figured it out. Outside of that installation was easy. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: D Brown

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, quiet, easy to install.  What's not to love?
customer_reviews.text: Old one out and new one in in about 30 minutes and I am NOT a plumber. Easy to follow instructions. Compared to the old one, this thing is whisper quiet. Now, we are on a septic system, so we don't grind up a whole lot; but this disposal handles our table scraps, and a few veggie peelings with ease. It has an extra 1/4 horse than our last model, so it's fabulous for our 3 person family. I highly recommend for all you amateur do-it-yourselfers out there - yes, that means you other ladies too!
customer_reviews.author: Possum

customer_reviews.title: Not so good
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 1/2hp model. Quiet operation compared to Bager. Mounting is very flimsy, no allen port at base to clear jams, no overload reset button. Seal leaked after 2.5 years. I replaced with a Moen disposer, which is the same damn disposer with a different name. I expect this one to fail in 2.5 years also.
customer_reviews.author: patrick c.

customer_reviews.title: Holy cow is this thing amazing
customer_reviews.text: My old badger 5 disposal of just over 4 years burned out. Decided to buy this one due to reviews and price, and am I glad I did. 1st this is cheaper than my old badger 5. 2nd this has a 5 yr warranty while my badger has 2. 3rd this is silent compared to my old one which sounded like a mustang engine. 4th this is much easier to install/uninstall. Took me about 30 mins tops removing old one and putting this in. Had I known before just how quiter this is, I would have boughten this a long time ago whether my old one burned out or not. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Vladimir Rivas

customer_reviews.title: Great price, easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: It took more time getting the old badger 1 out than putting in the l2600. Thanks to all the great reviews and installs, it was easy. I did not use the thin rubber gasket and used only plumbers putty and the screwed it into the sink opening as hard as I could turn it. 1 turn and the new disposal was mounted. I reused all the old piping. They only thing I forgot was to punch out the dishwasher outlet which was my fault, otherwise only took about 15 minutes. It is probably as loud as my older one but it does sound different. I wouldn’t jet plane like as some reviews said, more like a loud whirling mechanical sound.
customer_reviews.author: Lock

customer_reviews.title: WORKS WELL; WORKS QUIETLY
customer_reviews.text: I read lots of reviews on this and other disposals and based primarily on those reviews and the price, I chose the Waste King and so far, happy with my choice. Some reviews said it was loud, others said it was quiet; I'd say its very quiet (for a garbage disposer) when dealing with softer food, but - while not overly loud - you can hear it working on firmer garbage. I cannot address the ease or lack of in respect to installation; I chose to purchase installation from Amazon (see separate review) because I knew I wasn't up to the task.
customer_reviews.author: P. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Light, inexpensive, and easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: The last time I installed a garbage disposal was about 13 years ago. It was an Insinkerator that cost $150 and was really heavy and difficult to install. My girlfriend had to stand in the sink to hold it down so I could install it from beneath the sink. Fast forward to 2017. This Waste King is very light. I was able to support it with one foot while using both hands to install it under the sink. There is only one tricky part, making sure the cushion mount is installed correctly. Other than that, it was a breeze to install. And for the price, it is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Hank

customer_reviews.title: Sound/pitch of blades Hurts
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work fine after a few months though it is louder then I expected. Peviously I had the base in-sinkeator which was less noisy. I don't use the rubber collar on the drain but perhaps if I did it would help with the sound. One last comment about the sound, not just the volume but the tone as the blades (not sure what you call them) in top of the unit make a shrilling high pitch sound when the unit starts which is uncomfortable to hear. I bought this unit primary because I was hoping it would be less suceptible to rusting but only time will tell. (I cannot evalute that point for many years (hopefully))
customer_reviews.author: Somewhat Rational

customer_reviews.title: Works like a champ
customer_reviews.text: Solid product. Needed some hose for the dishwasher connection and some PVC to Re plumb my drains as I didn’t have a disposal installed previously. Otherwise this came with everything I needed, and I had it installed in about 60 minutes not counting the drive to and from the hardware store. Works like a champ, not too loud, gets rid of food quickly although we only use it for the scraps we couldn’t throw away- we don’t deliberately stuff food into it. Only complaint is the ring at the bottom of the sink is pretty scratched after only a few months of use.
customer_reviews.author: dodgeballs

customer_reviews.title: SO FAR...........SO GOOD!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this unit to replace an ailing and aging disposal. I had a Badger for the last 15 years and it was a tried and true workhorse. It just gave up. I always wondered about the Waste King Brand, so I decided to try something different. I bought this mid-level disposer. It was super easy to install and it is pleasantly quiet. It is quieter than my badger I had previously. After the install, i worked it over for about a week to see if it would leak. NO LEAKS. But, I always give products a six month window to work or fail. We will see.....fingers crossed.
customer_reviews.author: J. L. Mack

customer_reviews.title: 2600 Ez Mount
customer_reviews.text: Product is good and at a great price I got. Much much less than Badger5 with a power cord. The one complaint I had as a rookie installer" is the instructions. Mine leaked at first and I called manufacturer about warranty they have big number on box,very convenient. They explained and emailed me a sheet of 2 common problems and I adjusted it /fixed it and bam perfect!...quiet and nearly half the cost of the one I replaced. The one thing I would suggest is they put that addendum they emailed about the neck and the hose in each box.
customer_reviews.author: e

customer_reviews.title: Great quality disposal!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know this before I purchased it but found in the instructions that this disposal is made by Moen. I have all Moen faucets and quality has been excellent. Hopefully this disposal is just as good. The mounting design is so much better than the previous Insinkerator and so much easier to install. Took me about 30 minutes. It is also so much quieter than the previous. Love that the rubber drain piece is removable/replaceable so you can easily clean it or fish something out of the disposal if something drops inside.
customer_reviews.author: C. Keller

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This disposal was a replacement that I had installed in my house 13 years ago, rather than have a plumber come and install this one I decided to do it myself. It was super easy! I watched the video included on this item, and read the instillation instructions that came with it. I made sure I had all the correct tools needed and proceeded. It took me about 2 hours from start to finish, from taking the old one out and putting this one in. Super easy, with easy to decipher instructions. I finished with no leaks and it worked great! For a moderate use disposal this is a great choice, and I wouldnt hesitate to purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: My Badger 5 went out after 11 years of use. Not bad. I ordered this Waste King based on overall reviews and am quite happy with the results. Installation was a brease. Just read the instructions carefully two or more times prior to beginning the exchange. There are a couple of tricky parts that can cause problems if you are not clear on what is being explained. I didn't need to use the dump tube that came with the disposer as the old one fit perfectly. Dishwasher hookup was a no brainer. Quieter than the Badger 5. Very good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Diann

customer_reviews.title: great quality garbage disposal
customer_reviews.text: I had to replace my old one and I like power of this garbage disposal. I didn't like plastic around motor as it made it bulkier and was hard to fit under the sink with other items already in there. Works great and it's been two years now.
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: Powerful but very noisy
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how loud this is when operating, atleast twice as loud as the insinkerator that it replaced. Seems to also vibrate quite a bit when running as well. If I could do it again would buy a more quiet and better insulated disposer.
customer_reviews.author: CRazz

customer_reviews.title: Great disposer for the money; very quite and 20 minute install.
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly easy install, literally took me 20 minutes start to finish. The 'easy thread' system couldn't work better. To be safe I still used plumbers putty on the top side of the sink flange even though it didn't require it.............the rubber gasket just looked too thin for my liking and I didn't want to have to remove it for leaks (there were no leaks with plumbers putty). Very quiet, in fact it's quieter than our original one which costs twice as much............though to be fair that one was a 2004 model so it's 12 years old now. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: The Thompsons

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: When my plumber went to install this he said the gasket was very cheap and would be leaking in no time. Also almost all garbage disposals are hardwired, this came with a cord. I feel most of the reviews on this are fake, when I went to Lowe’s to purchase a new one they told me all of their garbage disposal’s are hardwired. Do not buy this unless you have an electrical outlet. Under your sink.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to more expensive units
customer_reviews.text: Replaced an old Badger 5 that was hard wired. The biggest complaint I had with this unit is having to cut off the power cord and fish it through the metal baseplate where I needed to run the incoming power cable. This new unit is much quieter than the Badger it replaced. Installation was easy (other than power cord removal). Due to cost, warranty, noise level and easy installation this thing definitely deserves 5 stars. I haven't had it long but will update if we run into any problems.
customer_reviews.author: JO

customer_reviews.title: great for the money...louder then i wanted but its ok
customer_reviews.text: very easy to install and works great, it jammed up one time, wish it had a nut on the bottom to unjam it, the directions say unplug get a wood stick and push it in the drain when it jams to free it up.. its kind of loud.. i dnt understand why people say it isn’t tht loud (must be deff). if noise isn’t an issue this is the one for you... i got the 1/2 hp model and it has a lot of power, i thought i bought the 3/4hp model ( had them both in the cart for a couple weeks and forgot to double check before checking out (my bad)
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I was torn between this and the in-sink-erator (I'm sure most people are). I choose this and I haven't looked back. It was easy to install, is quieter than my old in-sink-erator, and although I haven't had to use it, has a longer warranty. I like the removable splash guard; it makes it easier to retrieve anything that falls in. UPDATE: June 2017 I've had this for about 10 months now. It's still quiet. It still does its job.
customer_reviews.author: J. Heyman

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I had to replace a 3 year old Badger disposal because the main grinding chamber rust pitted and started to leak. I wanted to try another brand since I was so disappointed with the Badger. The Waste King came on time and well packaged. The directions were very clear and the installation was easy and straight forward. I hope the service life of the Waste King is much better than my old unit.
customer_reviews.author: Jim S.

customer_reviews.title: Remember to turn the mount ring Counter-Clockwise
customer_reviews.text: After using several incarnations of Insink......I decided to try the Waste King. My biggest problem with my previous disposals had been with rust on the impellers. The stainless steel parts on this should last longer. When I removed my broken disposal; I found the mounting brackets had begun to rust as well. It was quick and easy to install this unit and aside from my lefty loosy righty tighty confusion; this unit was installed and tested in less than an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Jimifan67

customer_reviews.title: Rugged construction
customer_reviews.text: I had and old hard wired disposal from Wards (yes it lasted that long!) This guy is heavy duty and quiet. It doesn't seem to get clogged up very easily. It was very easy to install! I had to convert my old hard wired switched disposal and added a GFI outlet for this one, it works very nicely and gives an extra outlet under the sink if it were ever needed. Been using for 6 months without any issues. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: KHandley

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and much quieter than it's competition.
customer_reviews.text: My third garbage disposal in 11 years went out (Badger brand). Each time it was leaking bearings. So I purchased and installed this Waste King. It was easier to install than I expected and having the cord already attached was pleasant. I didn't even need to use plumbers putty. The light rubber gasket went onto the top of the sink drain and a fiber gasket underneath the sink. When I went to run the disposal I was happy to find it is a much quieter piece of equipment. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: xchrisp

customer_reviews.title: Great easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This garbage disposal was installed in less than 30 mins aside. I bought a house with a kitchen sink with two old crappy disposals, they stopped working about a week ago. I did my homework and found that the waste King was the best bang for my buck. If you can read and have the basic tools you should be able to install this very quickly. It was harder to take the old one out then put the new one in. Also a huge plus, it came with a three prong plugs already attached and ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Great low cost replacement for my old disposal
customer_reviews.text: This was a very easy install, my old garbage disposal was nearing ~18 years and was rusty and noisy. This in comparison is quiet and works very well to get the job done. Install was easy and required minimal tools (flat head screwdriver really). My existing piping worked just fine so it was just disconnect and reconnect from old and attach to new.
customer_reviews.author: J. B.

customer_reviews.title: Grind it out
customer_reviews.text: Most disposals mount similarly, and this one is no different. It does have a detent when fully engaged which secures it well. Realistically, other than installation, the only way we can sense the performance is to see it work and hear how little sound it makes while doing it. This is quiet and operates smoothly. Very good.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this disposal to replace an InSinkErator that went out. At first I was a little wary because it was much cheaper that the original brand and I had not particularly heard of this brand before. After reading the reviews I decided to make the purchase. The install was very easy and not only does it work better and run much quieter than the InSinkErator but it is larger too! I definitely recommend the Waste King Legend! We have used it daily for months with no issues and are very pleased with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Cherry

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this disposal to replace an InSinkErator Badger 5 ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this disposal to replace an InSinkErator Badger 5 Series that had started to leak. The installation was a breeze, easier in fact then removing the old badger with a compression ring. The only difficulty which wasn't difficult was having to remove the factory installed plug so that it could be hardwired directly to a braided conduit cable. As far as the unit is concerned it runs quieter than the badger series and seems to chew up anything put down so far.
customer_reviews.author: Steven M. Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Installed the Waste King today
customer_reviews.text: Installed the Waste King today. Seems like a decent product. Very quiet. My problem is calling this an easy mount system. The rubber gasket does not provide a great seal. It took a hammer to tighten the flange underneath enough to keep the water from dripping. My biggest complaint was shipping. The outflow plastic pipe was smashed when I opened the box. Also I'm pretty sure this had been returned before. Smashed pipe, manual was ripped and the box had one piece of tape holding it closed. It had definitely been opened before. Not real happy about that
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Food buildup leads to bad smell
customer_reviews.text: We have had this for over 2 years and have consistently had a problem with bad odors from buildup under the drain gasket and in some nooks inside the disposal. I have never had this problem with any other disposal. I have tried a variety of methods regularly to try and keep it from happening with no luck. I end up having to use a toothbrush to scrub out the buildup as best as possible every few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Easiest ever to install
customer_reviews.text: This is second Waste King Disposal I have installed this year (different kitchens). I am a little handy-and will attempt doing such on my own. I am a 72 year old widow and other than challenges of working on stuff under a sink, the mounting system made it very easy to install. Instructions were great and fortunately it fit perfectly with the pipe configuration of the old one I removed.
customer_reviews.author: LE

customer_reviews.title: Best disposal for your money.
customer_reviews.text: Is tested regularly with several thick skinned lemons...I keep fresh lemonade in my refrigerator and as a result have a steady supply of lemon to run through garbage disposal which keeps it smelling fresh. I have not detected any signs that disposal is not able to withstand the challenge. Also my husband did the installation without any problems. Everything that was needed camein the package. We watched a youtube video on the installation process just prior and simply removed the old garbage disposal and installed the waste king. I had done my research before selecting the waste king i.e. significance of motor rpm & horsepower. I sincerely think that this particular disposal is the absolute best bang for your bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Justina Armes

customer_reviews.title: Drains from the bottom instead of into the drainpipe.
customer_reviews.text: I should have stuck with the Badger that needed to be replaced, but this unit was cheaper and was recommended by Amazon. BIG MISTAKE. I went through the trouble of switching out the entire mechanism to hang the disposal. But when I got this one all hooked up and I tried it out, it leaked -- no, make that, it GUSHED -- out of the bottom. Utterly useless. No answer on their customer support line, because I did this on the weekend. On the plus side, the motor sounds nice. It's quiet and seems powerful. If only it could direct water to the drain pipe it might actually work nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Friendly Folks

customer_reviews.title: This is a great Garbage Disposal
customer_reviews.text: I had to sell this garbage disposal and the person who bought it loves it. The only reason I sold it is because the hookups didn't line up with my existing disposal and I had to purchase another one, the same that I already have which is a completely different brand of disposal. The only thing I suggest is that if you're replacing a broken or leaking garbage disposal, is that you choose one that matches your existing disposal so you won't run into the trouble I did when installing it.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia June

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 1 year over warranty
customer_reviews.text: Installed my unit in January of 2012. Installation was relatively simple and I did not need to modify any of the plumbing, but added a receptacle as the unit it was replacing was hard wired. The Waste King was substantially quieter than the unit if was replacing. Annnnnd now for the down side. It had a 5 year warranty and in February it started to not start or ran slowly - I am figuring a bearing is going. So 5 year warranty and 6 year operational life and it is not used particularly hard, but I am going to give it the benefit of the doubt and go with another one.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond C

customer_reviews.title: Quality at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I have multiple rental properties. This has become my "go to" garbage disposal and I've recommended/installed them for friends/family as well. You won't find a better quality disposal at a better price. The stainless steel components are infinitely better than what you find in most disposals at Home Depot and Lowes and ensure a much longer life span with fewer issues.
customer_reviews.author: Freeflying1

customer_reviews.title: The new baseline in performance value
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install (follow the instructions)... which means it's easy to remove; win win. It's less noisy than a Badger (Insinkerator) it replaced. Stainless grinding chamber + composite body = corrosion resistant. We also like the removable splash guard on the EZ install model. Finally, the cord and plug are already installed, making this essentially plug-n-play. No more wrestling with 3 bolt mounts or wiring. Insinkerator has been 'resting on their laurels' for decades... Waste King is the new baseline for disposals with superior value. This is brand new install as of January 3, 2017, so I'll report back and update this review if any 'issues' arise... hopefully not.
customer_reviews.author: Lava Lamps

customer_reviews.title: It's okay for what I got!!
customer_reviews.text: I had to replace my In-Sinkerator after it rusted out. This is all plastic and 1/4 HP bigger. It was pretty easy to hookup, but I did have to cut the drain pipe to allow for it to attach to the dishwasher line. However, it's not as quite as I had expected. It may not be as loud (DB) but it does have a rumble. Almost like it's off balance. And there is nothing lodged in it. It's also much bigger than my other one and hangs lower. So expect to have extra room.
customer_reviews.author: Matt KTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Works well, compact, quiet enough
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased with the ease to install this disposal. It is compact, so leaves space for storage under the sink. Noise level is relatively low compared to some other disposals. We compost most of our food waste so only use it for light amounts left over in the sink. It works great for this, but I can't comment on how it would do for heavy disposal. Of course, if you don't have a switched electrical outlet in your sink cabinet, you will need to add one, which is a bigger job.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very easy install. Cheap sink flange!
customer_reviews.text: Easy install. Before mounting the cushion mount to the mount ring watch the U-Tube video made by BeautyForScraps. It will save you a whole lot of time and frustration. Installation instructions will have you installing incorrectly. The only thing I absolutely hate about this unit is the sink flange is some sort of cheap chromed piece that stands out like a sore thumb on a stainless sink. Very disappointing that they couldn’t have made this out of stainless for the price paid. I couldn’t use my old one because the mounting is different.
customer_reviews.author: Darwin, Hanford Ca

customer_reviews.title: Nice light-duty machine
customer_reviews.text: If I had a family and had to cook every night I would not buy this disposal. For light use it works just fine. A bit noisier than I like but it was well priced for my budget. The installers were fantastic, quick and thourough-even straightened out the crazy maze of pipes left by a previous plumber. I am satisfied and pleased with the service.
customer_reviews.author: CalifWoman

customer_reviews.title: Good value with so so mounting method
customer_reviews.text: This mounting method leaves a bit to be desired. The collar that the actual disposal attaches to is aluminum, but the disposal only has 2 plastic ears that attach it to the collar (ideally it would have at least 3 or use stainless steel for the attachment point). We'll see how long that lasts. The actual unit itself is well made, quiet, and has a plastic and stainless steel construction interior construction so it won't get rusty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and QUIET!
customer_reviews.text: Sure, practice makes perfect, and seeing that this was the fourth sinkerator I've installed, I'm probably more seasoned than I have any business being. I did have to hardwire the electric, which proved to be a bit of a challenge. It required me to tear out the plastic that surrounds the AC cable. Easier said then done, but with 10 minutes, a knife and pair of pliers I successfully removed the AC cable from the unit. Easily the quietest sinkerator I've ever user. So quiet it makes you question whether food is sinkerating or not. Haven't encountered anything that it can't handle.
customer_reviews.author: neuroned

customer_reviews.title: Never seen anything like that in all his professional installations
customer_reviews.text: Disposal kept backing up, whenever hot water was being used. I got another professional plumber to make sure that everything was in order, but he was just as surprised and baffelled! Never seen anything like that in all his professional installations. We replaced it with a Badger, and that worked perfectly!!!! Not sure if this is an odd misbuilt unit, but the manufacturer should check into it. It gets 1 star for looks and not function.
customer_reviews.author: Adnan J.

customer_reviews.title: It's 50% quieter than the badger I replaced and it works great! I definitely recommend it over insinkerator
customer_reviews.text: I'm blown away by this disposal! I had to replace a badger, and I Installed this on my stainless sink in 15 minutes, no putty or plumbing modifications needed. It comes with all you need (for stainless steel sinks), you might need putty if you have a ceramic sink. It's 50% quieter than the badger I replaced and it works great! I definitely recommend it over insinkerator, it's cheaper, quieter and has better warranty. It also comes with the cord and 3 prong plug already wired. Don't think twice if updating from an insinkerator. You won't need anything additional to make it work.
customer_reviews.author: maurizio matteo d'errico

customer_reviews.title: So easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe how easy this was for me to install.. I was waiting on someone to do it for me thinking it was too hard..Nope I just installed it less than 30mins. I am a woman soo:-).. My old one was cracked n corroded that water leaked and I was unable to run dishwasher. This worked perfect
customer_reviews.author: mya31

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and quiet
customer_reviews.text: When my service rep offered to install a new disposal from his truck for $500, I told him I'd buy one myself. I still had to have him install it because I have two injured rotator cuffs. I'm surprised that so inexpensive a grinder is so quiet. You can hardly hear it with the cupboard doors closed. It is also narrower than my old one; now I can hang my dish drainer under the sink beside it. I've had it about six months and no issues. Go for it!
customer_reviews.author: editor.john

customer_reviews.title: Good product and price
customer_reviews.text: We installed this some time ago, still works very well and have had no issues with it. It comes with a normal power plug end so if the old disposal was hard wired, you will need to install a power plug under the sink. Install was not too hard but difficult to get the mounting ring in place. The hole in the disposal is smaller than our old one but has not been an issue - just can't use the same drain plug for both sides of the sink.
customer_reviews.author: Bill R.

customer_reviews.title: Direct replacement for rusted out badger 5
customer_reviews.text: Just wanted to let people know that this unit will line up perfectly for an existing piping. In my case an rusted out badger 5. I haven't used this unit for long but so far it gobbled up everything I threw at it. It seems more powerful then the badger 5. It's not that loud, but it's not quite either. When I first turned the unit on without the water running I thought that it was loud. With the water running, I don't find it bothersome, it's just kinda like a background noise. Anyways kudos on the all stainless steel grinding mechanism, and five year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: al

customer_reviews.title: impossible to convert
customer_reviews.text: cord is impossible to remove for hard wiring.took me an hour to remove it from the casing.installation was easy,however once installed it was the loudest disposal i've ever owned.immediately replaced with a moen from the home depot.this is a piece of garbage & a waste time & money.DON'T BUY WASTE KING!also,if something falls in it you will need a small childs hand to get it out,the opening is considerably smaller than a standard opening.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great ratings, great review, temporary product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of the rave reviews and for the most part they were right. Except that 1 year and one month after installing the brand spanking new garbage disposal it just quietly dies one day to the next, without ever malfunctioning making a strange noise or otherwise giving any warning. Planned obsolescense???? I am tempted to believe so. One year warranty expires, 15 days later, disposal dies. Not happy Waste King. Not Happy.
customer_reviews.author: Reine Soleil

customer_reviews.title: It seems to do a good job chewing things up but I hate the noise
customer_reviews.text: I had this installed less than 2 months ago when doing a kitchen remodel. I gave the disposal only 2 stars because it roars loudly when grinding, as if it's going to take off and fly. It seems to do a good job chewing things up but I hate the noise.I only use it for food scraps, no bones, peelings etc. since we have a septic tank. I wish I had of just left the old one in instead. It was still working ok and much, much quieter.
customer_reviews.author: Mar

customer_reviews.title: easy mount
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty loud. On par with the 9-year old Insinkerator Badger 5 that it replaced. Regret not upgrading to a reduced volume model. But, for the price, it's excellent. It was harder to remove the old unit then to put the new one in. The easy mount system is very simple. Once I got the hammer out and locked it into locked position, it seems very solid.
customer_reviews.author: Skynet131

customer_reviews.title: Easy install, great quality
customer_reviews.text: I like how easy it is to install. Could be easily dyi. Providing wall plug was helpful to set it with a remote switch. Overall quality is great. end of the day it feels so good not pick up dirts from the sink after loading dishwasher. Definitely should buy a separate remote switch to control when to run to avoid creating noise during ungodly hours.
customer_reviews.author: SKG

customer_reviews.title: Quiet...Quiet...Quiet Champion!
customer_reviews.text: Thus far, this disposal has met or exceeded all my expectations. Bear in mind it was installed 30 days ago so...time will tell. It is installed on a single-drain sink and alot of water and garbage will be the ultimate test. As stated, thus far...no problems at all. Oh yes, it was professionally installed in less than 20 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: m9777

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I had a little difficulty installing this. I called the customer service number and they were great. I was making a stupid error and they quickly were able to walk me through the problem. Now that it's installed, works great. Haven't had any problems in the few months it's been installed.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Lenhart

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our house!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to replace an old GE garbage disposal that had begun to leak. Installation was a lot simpler than I thought it would be. The only hang up for us was the old garbage disposal had been installed without a quick mounting system and had been in place so long (it was here when we bought our house in June) the connection was impossible to break loose and we had to cut it off. But after that installation of the new waste king system was simple and straightforward. It’s worked amazingly since and compared to the old GE it is whisper quiet. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Hallum

customer_reviews.title: Mostly good, with one issue.
customer_reviews.text: This unit works so far (only been 2 days). The install wasn't difficult. The only issue we've had is that when mounting on a single bowl sink, the provided rubber strainer that keep big things from falling into the disposal actually keeps water from flowing down the drain. The holes and slits in it are so small and tight that the sink won't drain. I've had to fix this by cutting the slits to be wider.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Esplin

customer_reviews.title: This disposal seems to be constructed pretty well. The installation was pretty easy
customer_reviews.text: This disposal seems to be constructed pretty well. The installation was pretty easy, although it does take a few hours to complete. Now if you were a plumber that did this all the time it might take only an hour but for the average guy that does DIY projects it will take a little longer. As for function, it works very well. Granted, it has only been in use for a couple of days but it works just fine and I have no complaints. I will update if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: Ron G.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible mounting system
customer_reviews.text: Crap! Don't buy this piece of junk. There's no metal mounting bracket like with other disposals. This hangs by rubber and the mounting unit slthey sent me seems defective as it doesn't even fit! We were unable to install this with what they sent us. Forget about the couple of dollars you might save with this. Buy anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Tara P.

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: It has been installed and it is working. It is a lot quieter than our last one and stuff tends to get blocked up in the throat because it is narrow; so, I have to push it down with a spoon. My plumber says he doesn't like the Waste King disposals, that they aren't very good. But, so far it is doing the job. I generally don't put any thing large or any animal products into it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara A. Lee

customer_reviews.title: 6 years and counting
customer_reviews.text: Installed this about 6 years ago and still runs like a champ. Have never had any issues with it. Not exactly quiet, but not aware of any that are. Overall easy to install and haven't ever noticed it struggle to handle anything I've tossed into it. Google claims the average disposer lasts 12 years so I should have a few more years of trouble free food pulverizing.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Waste King Legend Series 1/2 HP Garbage Disposal with Power Cord - (L-2600) ANAHEIM MFG I did a lot of shopping around and found this appeared to be most reliable and best value. Prime shipping got it here in a day. My handyman installed it in 30 minutes and said it is one of the best units he's seen. It's quiet and efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Free Heat

customer_reviews.title: Great Disposal for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a 12 YO unit that had failed. This unit was shipped/received in 2 days. Requires two activities: 1. Replace all of the sink mounting hardware as this Waste King is not standard to other disposal mounts...2. I also had to add a duplex outlet box under the sink to allow this corded unit to power up. The box mount added $5 of hardware and 10 minutes to the install. It was easier to add a surface mount box under the sink than to uncouple the factory plug wire. Good quiet unit. The disposal opening is 1/2 smaller than the unit it replaced but strong and quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great product but be sure to use plumbers putty!
customer_reviews.text: This disposal is great. Very easy to install. But regardless of what other reviews or the product say about not needing plumbers putty, that is incorrect. We installed the you disposal per the directions, step by step. We Turned on the water and it instantly leaked around the seal. We disassembled and added plumbers putty. No leaks after that. Great product but use the putty and you won't have any leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Tlmoore524

customer_reviews.title: Even better than my expectations!
customer_reviews.text: Roto-Rooter wanted $500 to replace my disposal. I bought this one for around $65 and installed it myself (with minimal plumbing knowledge). The instructions were easy to follow and the install of this disposal was actually much easier than removing the broken one! This is about half as loud as my previous disposal but is the same HP and seems to work just as well - if not better. I'd highly recommend this disposal and self installation to save yourself some money!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install 2600 Mod.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, wish they did not have the plugin electric cord installed but good for those who have a outlet under the sink, every thing you need is there except you may need plumbers putty or an adapter for dishwasher drain, I did not, the one I received was a quick connect and it worked quite well, pretty quite and you get a plug for sink drain. Highly recommend and very good price, very quick delivery
customer_reviews.author: TALLONE

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Amazing replacement from the traditional mount style garbage disposal. Sink flange looks great join my sink as well. Instal was about 20 minutes which included the time to read through the instructions. Took more time to get the old one out than it did to put the new one in. Quieter than my old one which was only 2 years old.
customer_reviews.author: john notte

product_meta.title: Waste King L-2600 Garbage Disposal with Power Cord, 1/2 HP
product_meta.description:
Size:L-2600Waste King l-2600: 1/2 horsepower garbage disposal with pre-installed power cord and Sound insulation. Energy efficient permanent magnet motor and stainless steel swivel impellers help reduce jamming. Fast and easy to install with a removable splashguard that is easy to clean and replace. Rust and corrosion-proof glass-filled nylon grind chamber and drain housing with stainless steel grinding components. Continuous feed technology. Front-mounted reset button for easy use. Safe to use with properly-sized septic tanks.

AMAZON.COM
The Waste King Legend 2600 1/2-Horsepower Disposer showcases a powerful motor, stainless steel grinding components, superior sound insulation, and a corrosion-proof grinding chamber for efficient, quiet, no-fuss waste disposal. Once installed, this continuous-feed garbage disposal will more than earn its place in your kitchen. 



Experience a More Powerful Grind
Featuring an energy-efficient, high-speed, 2,600 RPM 'Vortex' permanent magnet motor, the Legend 2600 offers more power per pound than comparative disposals.

This 0.5-horsepower motor will grind tough foods, and it requires 115 volts, 60 Hertz, and 4.5 current-amps to operate.

Jam-Free, Mess-Free Feeds
The Legend 2600 is a continuous-feed disposer, which means you can add waste while the unit runs. Stainless steel swivel impellers reduce jamming, and an easily removable splash guard keeps things tidy. A front-mounted reset button allows for simple operation. Grinding Components Minimize Noise and Wear
Because the Legend 2600's grinding chamber is made of glass-filled nylon, you will never have to worry about corrosion. Also, the stainless steel grinding components are insulated, so you'll get the quietest grind possible.

Easy Installation; Works with Septic Tanks
The Waste King Legend 2600 includes a fast-and-easy mount system, with all the necessary hardware for no-hassle installation. The disposer is safe for properly sized septic tanks and comes with a power cord.

What's in the Box
The Waste King Legend 2600 1/2-Horsepower Disposer, mounting hardware, and power cord.
feature_bullets: HIGH-SPEED MOTOR: The 1/2 HP, 2600 rpm (115v) permanent magnet motor jams less
EASY INSTALLATION AND CLEANING: EZ Mount for a quick and easy kitchen sink installation, removable splashguard for easy cleaning
NO ELECTRICAL EXPERTISE NEEDED: Pre-installed power cord, no electrical work required
DURABILITY: Compact and lightweight garbage disposer with all stainless steel grind components
CONTINUOUS FEED DISPOSAL: Activated by a wall switch, the disposal quickly grinds food waste continuously as it runs.36 in. power cord included
NOTE FROM THE MANUFACTURER: Customers may receive product with the original brand logo or updated logo and packaging. Grind chamber material- Corrosion proof polymer

specifications.Included Components: 36-Inch Power Cord, Splash Guard, Continuous Feed Operation Garbage Disposal
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars5,420 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
